products.title: Perfect Fit Hive Plain Cream Duo Thermal Blind
products.description: Hive blinds have a unique honeycomb structure, which not only offer light control but are also energy saving. They can regulate room temperature by helping to reduce heat loss in winter and help keep rooms cool in summer. Perfect fit hive plain cream duo thermal blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
